text: The 2019 Dutch Indoor Athletics Championships () was the 48th edition of the national championship in indoor track and field for the Netherlands. It was held on 16–17 February at the Omnisport Apeldoorn in Apeldoorn. A total of 24 events (divided evenly between the sexes) were contested over the two-day competition. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |60 metres |Joris van Gool ||6.63 |Jamiro Elabeidi ||6.71 |Elvis Afrifa
